CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Riverbend Plantation relative to Golden Harvest Cooperative?
SRP.A: Riverbend Plantation is {above} Golden Harvest Cooperative in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Harvest Cooperative relative to Riverbend Plantation?
SRP.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative is {below} Riverbend Plantation in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Riverbend Plantation}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Riverbend Plantation's minimum Livestock Production in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Riverbend Plantation's minimum Livestock Production is in {1996}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Golden Harvest Cooperative's maximum Livestock Production in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's maximum Livestock Production is in {1990}.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2008, did the total Livestock Production experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 2008?
NC.A: The change in total livestock production between 2002 and 2008 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 2008.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 2015, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1994 and 1997?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1991 and 2015 was {higher} than between 1994 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2012, did the total Livestock Production experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total livestock production between 2002 and 2012 was {larger} than between 2000 and 2009.

NC.Q: Was the total Livestock Production in 2001 higher or lower than in 2012?
NC.A: The total livestock production in 2001 was {higher} than in 2012.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Riverbend Plantation} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Golden Harvest Cooperative and Riverbend Plantation first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative and Riverbend Plantation first exchanged leading positions in {1991}.
